short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches character data from Sakura /chat/ and generates exportable JSON for bot platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why Use Sakura FM Character Tool?

Are you a bot creator or role-playing enthusiast looking to streamline your character data management? The Sakura FM Character Tool is designed to effortlessly fetch and organize character data from Sakura’s /chat/* URLs into a standardized JSON format. Whether you’re exporting characters for major bot platforms or just looking to manage your role-playing characters more efficiently, this tool saves you time and ensures your data is perfectly formatted every time.

Key Benefits:

	•	Seamless Data Extraction: Automatically fetch and process character data directly from Sakura’s chat URLs.
	•	Perfect Formatting: Converts character details into a clean, standardized JSON format ready for export or further customization.
	•	Easy Export: One-click download of your character data, saving you the hassle of manual formatting.
	•	Versatile Use: Whether you’re integrating with a chatbot platform or storing characters for future role-playing sessions, this tool adapts to your needs.
	•	User-Friendly: Designed for both tech-savvy users and beginners, with a simple, intuitive interface.

Elevate your character management process with the Sakura FM Character Tool—because your time is better spent playing with them, than for manually entering them!
